directions: Using a sharp knife, split each vanilla bean lengthwise.
Scrape out the seeds from each vanilla bean with the back of the knife.
Place the vanilla beans and seeds into a glass jar or bottle.
Pour the vodka into the jar, ensuring that the beans are fully submerged.
Seal the jar tightly and store it in a cool, dark place for at least 6 weeks, shaking the jar occasionally.
After 6 weeks, the vanilla extract can be used in your recipes.
